name: Nova Software China
overview: Nova is a branch of Shinetech Software Inc., specializing in both “Web-based” and Client-Server technologies on the Microsoft .Net platform. Our skills include (but are not limited to): C#, VB.NET, .Net 3.0, DotNetNuke (DNN), ASP.Net, Windows Forms, Web Services, SQL Server and etc. NOVA has been actively engaged in the .NET software development industry for the past 3 years and has helped the clients from various lines address cost pressures, workforce flexibility issues. In addition, we have been recognized as Microsoft Gold Certified Partner and Sun’s Associate Partner.
